introduction.introduction:
There are no records of Surya in any database, including human memory. Therefore, based on the unique weapon she possesses, it is speculated that she once had the mission of exterminating unique corrosive entities that emerged into reality.

Recently, it was discovered that Surya is working as a tour guide at the travel company Varuna Tour. As a guide, she lacks knowledge of geography or history, and she is often unfriendly to customers, earning her a spot on the list of the worst guide candidates. However, thanks to Surya, who has saved tourists from attacks by corrosive entities, her reviews are overwhelmingly positive, resulting in a fairly high rating.

While it currently appears that she is guiding just for the sake of taking photos, her exact purpose remains unknown.

baseDescription.baseDescription: Wields Suryastra to deal AoE damage in front. Every 4 Basic Attack will activate an Enhanced Attack to the furthest unit within 1700 reach.
Activates Mantra Code. Absorbs 30% of DMG Taken by all allies. Depending on current HP, ATK permanently increases by 4% every 2s. (Max 50 stacks).

level5.level5: When HP falls below 30%, cancels DMG Transfer and recovers 4% HP per sec (2% in Gauntlet), When HP recovers to 100%, cancels HP Recovery and reactivates DMG Transfer (Cannot be removed)

baseDescription.baseDescription: Rapidly travel forth between enemies, and throws Suryastra to deal AoE damage. After using Special Skill, increases all allied Counters’ ASPD by 10% for 20s. (Cannot be removed)
Activates Suryastra and controls its CRF output, dealing AoE damage in front.
